title: Apollo87
author: Apollo87
content: How do you guys test or "function check" the control boards? Are there any documents out there that cover this? I've looked but haven't come across anything yet. Thanks.

comments.author: MinerMEDIC
comments.body: Funny you should ask, I actually just made one this week.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5398334.0Cheers,J

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: There is no test function tool you can use for antminer controller the guide share above is talking about Beaglebone which is the old controller for s3/s5/s7 units. You can manually test the function of the unit why not follow this troubleshoot below- https://www.zeusbtc.com/asic-miner-troubleshooting/antminer/control-board/Or get an idea from this link below on how to connect the control board through pinouts(RX, TX and GND)- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2386296.0
